entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this morning and this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
